Package org.araneaframework.http

Contains interfaces and implementations that make up the executable Aranea framework (filters, routers, etc) that depend on web (specially servlet, ...) interfaces.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
FileUploadInputExtension Extension to OutputData that allows access the uploaded files.
HttpInputData Provides methods to deal with and manipulate low-level HTTP constructs.
HttpOutputData Provides methods to deal with the manipulate low-level HTTP constructs.
JspContext One of Aranea environment contexts, this one for retrieving information about some JSP configuration.
PathInfoServiceContext A top level service that is not synchronized and is dependent only on the request.
PopupServiceInfo Encapsulates info about popup window properties and URL where servicing session-thread lives.
PopupWindowContext An interface for manipulating popup windows (each popup window corresponding to server-side "thread").
ServletServiceAdapterComponent A service adapter which by having the servlet's service method, translates a servlet's request into a service call.
StateVersioningContext Interface of a component hierarchy state versioning filter.
StateVersioningContext.ClientNavigationAware Interface that should be implemented by Components who wish to be notified of various events in state versioning context.
ThreadCloningContext Service that clones currently running session thread upon request and sends a response that redirects to cloned session thread.
UpdateRegionContext Update region filter, supporting updating of HTML page regions and sending miscellaneous data back via AJAX requests.
UpdateRegionProvider A way to pass custom data back to client-side via AJAX requests.
WindowScrollPositionContext Filter that takes care of saving and restoring the browser window scroll position between requests.
 

Class Summary
StateVersioningContext.State A static class representing a state in the state versioning context.
 

Exception Summary
StateVersioningContext.StateExpirationException A static class representing a state expiration exception that is thrown when some one tries to reach discarded state.
 

Package org.araneaframework.http Description

Contains interfaces and implementations that make up the executable Aranea framework (filters, routers, etc) that depend on web (specially servlet, ...) interfaces.
